paper_title.en: TESTING OF UNIFORM COLOUR SPACE USING CORRESPONDING COLOURS UNDER DIFFERENT ILLUMINANTS

description.en: Corresponding colours under various types of light sources including white LEDs were measured to test which uniform colour space could be appropriate to asses colour rendering index. It was suggested that the CAM02-UCS would predict colour appearance well compared with the CIELAB and the CIECAM02, while the adoption of colour space concerned with colour difference would affect the value of colour rendering index very little. So far, we could not reach the conclusion which of colour spaces is better for calculation of colour rendering index. We might need further examination of the adoption of uniform colour space.

publication_name.en: PROCEEDINGS OF CIE 2012 LIGHTING QUALITY AND ENERGY EFFICIENCY

paper_title.en: COLOUR RENDERING EVALUATION OF WHITE LED ILLUMINATION BY COMPARATIVE ASSESSMENT

description.en: This article presents the results of subjective experiments concerning colour rendering evaluation of white LED light sources to obtain fundamental data for developing a new colour rendering index applying various light sources including LEDs.

publication_name.en: PROCEEDINGS OF CIE 2012 LIGHTING QUALITY AND ENERGY EFFICIENCY

paper_title.ja: 均等色差空間に基づいた色差式
paper_title.en: New color-difference formula based on uniform color-difference space

description.en: A new color-difference formula based on uniform color-difference space presented. CIELAB color space that was revised seemed to create an equal color difference between the adjacent hue lines or chroma lines on the Munsell system. Weighting functions for a new chroma scale and new hue-difference scale adjust the distance in uniform space to the perceived color-difference magnitude of the Munsell system. We called this uniform space a uniform color-difference space. We determined the total color-difference between two color samples with the weighting factor corresponding to the location of the color samples in uniform color-difference space. The Relationships between the total color-difference used in the new formula and the perceived magnitude were performs analyzed through visual perception data sets. The new formula is better than CIELAB, CIE94, and CIEDE2000.

publisher.en: The Illuminating Engineering Institute of Japan

paper_title.ja: 均等色差空間の開発－マンセル表色系に基づいた検討－
知覚的な白さの判断基準の解析
paper_title.en: The Study of Criterion of the Perceptual Whiteness

description.ja: 白色度式に関する研究は多くあり、その研究から知覚的な白さは評価者で異なることが分かっている。本研究の目的は知覚的な白さを決めている心理的な構造を探るものである。29枚の紙サンプル、18枚の布サンプル、47枚の紙と布を合わせたサンプルの白さに関する心理評価を行い、その結果から、評価者を2群に分類した。一つの群は、白さの評価を明るさと、ある極大値からの色みの差で評価している。もう一つの群は、白さの評価を別の極大値からの色みの差で評価している。
description.en: There are many studies of the whiteness formula. As a result, the assessment of whiteness depends on the observer. This stusy aim to clarify the psychological structure of the perceptual whiteness. The 29 paper samples,the 18 cloth samples and the 47 combined papaer and cloth samples are assessed as the perceptual whiteness. The observers are classified into two groups by the order of perceptual whiteness. The one group assess the whiteness by mainly the lightness and next the distance of the chromaticness from the peack value. The other group assess the whiteness by the distance of the chromaticness from the other peack value.

publication_name.en: Journal of the Color Science Association of Japan

paper_title.en: Space Modification Uniform Color-difference based on Munsell System

paper_title.ja: 知覚的な白さの判断基準の解析
paper_title.en: The Study of Criterion of the Perceptual Whiteness

This stusy aim to clarify the psychological structure of the perceptual whiteness. The 29 paper samples,the 18 cloth samples and the 47 combined papaer and cloth samples are assessed as the perceptual whiteness. The observers are classified into two groups by the order of perceptual whiteness. The one group assess the whiteness by mainly the lightness and next the distance of the chromaticness from the peack value. The other group assess the whiteness by the distance of the chromaticness from the other peack value.

paper_title.ja: 均等色差空間の開発－CIELABクロマスケールの修正
許容色差データによる色差式の性能評価
識別色差と許容色差に基づく色差式の性能比較

paper_title.en: Space Modification Uniform Color-difference in CIELAB Chroma-difference Scale

paper_title.ja: 識別色差と許容色差に基づく色差式の性能比較
paper_title.en: Performance Testing of Color-difference Formulas Based on the Relationship Between Perceptibility and Acceptability of Color-difference

description.ja: 筆者は、陶磁器タイル製造工業で多く利用されている低彩度領域の7色を基準色とする色差の識別閾及び色差の許容域の観測結果を報告した。この観測結果を用いて、識別色差と許容色差との関係を検討し、両者の関係を明らかにした。更に、識別確率曲線と許容確率曲線から求めた実用色差を用いて、5種類の色差式の性能試験を実施した。その結果、CIEDE_<2000>は、色の違いによる変動が少ないこと及び色差属性間の補正が必要であることを明らかにした。
description.en: I reported perceptibility and acceptability datasets of color-difference for seven colors as popular colors at ceramics tile industry. With this color-difference dataset, I examined relation with perceptibility and acceptability of color-difference and clarified relation of bath. Furthermore, performance of five kinds of color-difference formulas was tested using the practical color-difference predicting from an intersection with perception probability curve and an acceptation probability curve. As a result, it can be seen that CIEDE_<2000> is significantly better than another formula and suggest that revision between color-difference attributes were necessary.

paper_title.en: Performance Testing of Color-difference Formulas Using Thier Acceptability Dataset
Visual color matching under various viewing conditions

description.en: In this article, we provide colorimetry data for which it was judged that the colors between different media matched under various viewing conditions. Painted color patches, a monitor, and printed color patches were used in the color matching experiments, in which we compared the appearances of the painted color patch and the monitor, or the monitor and the printed color patch, using the method of constant stimuli. The nine types of viewing conditions we used could be envisaged to occur when comparing different device outputs indoors. The experimental data obtained were compared with corresponding colors predicted with the use of five types of color appearance model, including color appearance formulae. We found that when the viewing conditions were the same for the different media, there was good agreement between the experimental data and the CIECAT94 model. And by adjusting the brightness induction and the chromatic induction factors, it was possible to improve conformity for the lightness and the chromaticity. Moreover, it was possible to improve the white point shift, which cannot be adjusted with the use of optimized parameters by introducing incomplete adaptation. By optimizing the parameters and introducing incomplete adaptation, it is possible to make the mean color difference DeltaE(ab)* between ab the corresponding color and the color matching point less than 10 CIELAB units for all of the viewing conditions. (C) 2002 Wiley Periodicals, Inc.

paper_title.en: Visual color matching under various viewing conditions

description.en: In this article, we provide colorimetry data for which it was judged that the colors between different media matched under various viewing conditions. Painted color patches, a monitor, and printed color patches were used in the color matching experiments, in which we compared the appearances of the painted color patch and the monitor, or the monitor and the printed color patch, using the method of constant stimuli. The nine types of viewing conditions we used could be envisaged to occur when comparing different device outputs indoors. The experimental data obtained were compared with corresponding colors predicted with the use of five types of color appearance model, including color appearance formulae. We found that when the viewing conditions were the same for the different media, there was good agreement between the experimental data and the CIECAT94 model. And by adjusting the brightness induction and the chromatic induction factors, it was possible to improve conformity for the lightness and the chromaticity. Moreover, it was possible to improve the white point shift, which cannot be adjusted with the use of optimized parameters by introducing incomplete adaptation. By optimizing the parameters and introducing incomplete adaptation, it is possible to make the mean color difference DeltaE(ab)* between ab the corresponding color and the color matching point less than 10 CIELAB units for all of the viewing conditions. (C) 2002 Wiley Periodicals, Inc.

paper_title.ja: 1998年 メディア間の色の見えの一致

paper_title.en: Visual Matching in Cross-media Color Reproduction
Performance evaluation of color appearance model

description.en: In cross-media color reproduction, color appearance (even under colorimetric matching conditions) is not be always the same even if the adaptation condition is same, because in that case the color appearance mode is different. Furthermore, if the viewing condition is di:different, the color appearance will not be same without considering the different adaptation condition appropriately. Several types of color appearance models have been proposed to predict a corresponding color that has the same color appearance as the original color under difference viewing condition. In this study, a color matching experiment was performed under nine types of viewing conditions (considering usual office surroundings), and then the color matching point and color tolerance was found for a sample trf colors. The performance of the prediction was evaluated by comparing the visual result with the corresponding color which was predicted from five models; CIECAM97;, NAYATANI, HUNT94, RLAB and CIECAT94.

publication_name.en: SIXTH COLOR IMAGING CONFERENCE: COLOR SCIENCE, SYSTEMS AND APPLICATIONS

paper_title.en: Performance evaluation of color appearance model

description.en: In cross-media color reproduction, color appearance (even under colorimetric matching conditions) is not be always the same even if the adaptation condition is same, because in that case the color appearance mode is different. Several types of color appearance models have been proposed to predict a corresponding color that has the same color appearance as the original color under difference viewing condition.
